name: DungeonSlayer
description:
In free time i make some games. On of them, is this console roguelike rpg with reference to diablo. I think this game has a many disbalance things, but i dont know, what i can do with this project. 

In this game you can chose you gender, race and class and try done all dungeon and finally kill Diab ... the Demon.

In game implemented inventary with many items. Threre is also magic and perks which you can chose.

You can view game code on: https://github.com/TakingAway/DungeonSlayer-roguelike/blob/master/Image/NewDungeon.png
